task_description:
Your task is to find a(n) living thing. First, focus on the thing. Then, move it to the blue box in the bedroom.
This room is called the living room. In it, you see:   the agent  a substance called air  a book shelf (containing A book (The Foundations of the Origin of Species) titled The Foundations of the Origin of Species by Charles Darwin)  a chair. On the chair is: nothing.  a couch. On the couch is: a white pillow.  a finger painting  a table. On the table is: nothing. You also see:  A door to the hallway (that is closed)
next_step:
Thought: I need to find a living thing in the living room. Currently, the only living thing I see is the agent (myself). I will focus on myself and then move to the bedroom to complete the task.  
Action: focus on the agent
